title: E264 Our Newfound Noodles and Christine's Quantum Thoughts
description: Welcome to episode 264 where we're using our newfound noodles to bring you this week's spooky stories! First Em takes us way out into the woods to cover the terrifying urban legend of staircases in the middle of the woods that lead to nowhere. Then Christine brings us the first in a two-part series on the disturbing Élan School. And if anyone knows where we can find a haunted Barbie dream house, let us know... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schieffer, Eva Gross)
